bibdata.title: ISO/IEEE Draft International Standard for Health Informatics
Point-of-care medical device communication
Application profiles -- Base Standard
ISO/IEEE Draft International Standard for Health Informatics - Point-of-care medical device communication - Application profiles -- Base Standard

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The scope of this standard is upper-layer (i.e. ISO OSI Application, Presentation, and Session) services and protocols for information exchange under ISO/IEEE 11073 Standards for Medical Device Communications (MDC). This standard is the Base Standard of the IEEE 1073.2, Medical Device Application Profiles (MDAP), as harmonized through CEN and ISO. (Renumbered from P1073.2.1.1)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
